name: Skating City: Funny Skateboard
description:
Choose your skateboard and run through the streets on your board in this speed action game! Ride, experience and practice the action and the thrill of learning new skate freestyle skateboarding trick with boards outside the skateboard park with half pipes, rails and ramps and impress your skate friends with kickflip and ollies and slides in this endless fast-paced skateboard race. Take your skate and ride to escape from the police! Beat your own skateboarding record to unlock more stunning skateboards. Surprise yourself with the amazingly realistic 3D graphics during the skate races! You'll think that you are skating for real in this skateboard game! Become the best street skater in town! Get on your skateboard and start a extreme skating run, improve your freestyle skills and become the best pro skater in the world fighting all the cops challenges outside the skatepark!
Features:
- Skateboard missions with extreme stunt game mania to perform.
- Different skateboarding techniques
- Unlock dangerous skateboarding stunts to become pro skater.
- Realistic skatepark & city environment with dangerous skirting hurdles.
- Amazing HD graphics with exciting skateboard sound effects.
